mapper.sql: COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.ID COURSECLASSPHOTO_ID, COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_ID COURSECLASSPHOTO_COURSEID, COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID COURSECLASSPHOTO_CLASSPHOTOID, COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.CREATE_TIME COURSECLASSPHOTO_CREATETIME, COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED COURSECLASSPHOTO_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO
COURSE_ID,
CLASS_PHOTO_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{classPhotoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO
COURSE_ID = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CLASS_PHOTO_ID = #{classPhotoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO where DELETED = 0

SELECT
from COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO where COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0 and COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
